SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE emailbccaccount SET EmailBccAccountIsDel = 1 WHERE EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@;

SELECT eba.EmailBccAccountID,eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryID,eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryName,eba.EmailBccAccountAddress,eba.EmailBccAccountName,eba.EmailBccAccountCreateTime,eba.EmailBccAccountLastTime,eba.EmailBccAccountIsDel FROM emailbccaccount AS eba WHERE eba.EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@;
SELECT eba.EmailBccAccountID FROM emailbccaccount AS eba WHERE eba.EmailBccAccountAddress=@@EmailBccAccountAddress@@ AND eba.EmailBccAccountIsDel = 0;

SELECT eba.EmailBccAccountID,eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryID,eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryName,eba.EmailBccAccountAddress,eba.EmailBccAccountName,eba.EmailBccAccountCreateTime,eba.EmailBccAccountLastTime,eba.EmailBccAccountIsDel FROM emailbccaccount AS eba WHERE eba.EmailBccAccountIsDel = 0 <R%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryID IN ('@@EmailBccAccountCategoryID@@')%R><R%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountAddress LIKE '%@@EmailBccAccountAddress@@%' %R> ORDER BY eba.EmailBccAccountID LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM emailbccaccount AS eba WHERE eba.EmailBccAccountIsDel = 0 <R%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryID IN ('@@EmailBccAccountCategoryID@@')%R><R%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountAddress LIKE '%@@EmailBccAccountAddress@@%' %R>;

SELECT eba.EmailBccAccountID,eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryID,eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryName,eba.EmailBccAccountAddress,eba.EmailBccAccountName,eba.EmailBccAccountCreateTime,eba.EmailBccAccountLastTime,eba.EmailBccAccountIsDel FROM emailbccaccount AS eba WHERE eba.EmailBccAccountIsDel = 0 <R%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountCategoryID IN ('@@EmailBccAccountCategoryID@@')%R><R%= AND eba.EmailBccAccountAddress LIKE '%@@EmailBccAccountAddress@@%' %R> ORDER BY eba.EmailBccAccountID ;
select EmailBccAccountCategoryName from emailbccaccount where EmailBccAccountCreateTime>SUBDATE(NOW(),INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) limit 1;

INSERT INTO `emailbccaccountcategory`(`Name`,`Sort`,`CreateTime`,`LastTime`) SELECT `EmailBccAccountCategoryName`,0,NOW(),NOW() FROM `emailbccaccount_temp` et LEFT JOIN `emailbccaccountcategory` ec ON ec.`Name`=et.`EmailBccAccountCategoryName` WHERE ec.`ID` IS NULL GROUP BY `EmailBccAccountCategoryName`; INSERT INTO `emailbccaccount`(`EmailBccAccountCategoryID`,`EmailBccAccountCategoryName`,`EmailBccAccountAddress`,`EmailBccAccountName`,`EmailBccAccountCreateTime`,`EmailBccAccountLastTime`,`EmailBccAccountIsDel`) SELECT ec.`ID`,et.`EmailBccAccountCategoryName`,et.`EmailBccAccountAddress`,et.`EmailBccAccountName`,NOW(),NOW(),0 FROM `emailbccaccount_temp` et LEFT JOIN `emailbccaccount` ebc ON et.`EmailBccAccountAddress`=ebc.`EmailBccAccountAddress` LEFT JOIN `emailbccaccountcategory` ec ON ec.`Name`=et.`EmailBccAccountCategoryName` WHERE ebc.`EmailBccAccountID` IS NULL; TRUNCATE TABLE `emailbccaccount_temp`;
